extendedInfo.description: Whether youâre buying, renting, selling, letting or browsing, you can now find a property throughout the UK whilst on the move.The free app gives you a handy link to search for a new home at mobile speeds. Use your GPS functionality to see what properties are for sale nearby, contact agents directly or just save for later. This app provides many more of the FindaProperty.com benefits optimised for your Phone.Download to get:â¢ Instant access to almost 1 million houses, flats and other properties on the market.â¢ Property search results on a mapâ¢ Contact estate agents directly â¢ See search results on a mapâ¢ Easy finger swipe navigationâ¢ Share via email and FacebookHappy house hunting from FindaProperty.comWe welcome feedback and are continuously improving the experience we provide to you so if you face an issue with our app, please let us know with as much detail about your phone and OS and we will aim to fix it immediately. Thank you.

reviews.title: Pointless?
reviews.comment: THIS ISNT AN APP. IT IS A LINK TO ZOOPLA.
reviews.author: Molly Kelly

reviews.title: Why Zoopla ????
reviews.comment: Upgraded version is useless. If I need zoopla features then I\'ll run zoopla\'app. I don\'t need the same app twice. Please how can I roll back to the old version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very user friendly
reviews.comment: Badly structured app, forces you to use the map to find properties instead of a list with pictures. Not worth downloading!
reviews.author: Rob Mackie

reviews.title: Slow, heavy, hard to use
reviews.comment: Slower and harder to use,  u can still look through it for properties and provides a basic property search tool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very difficult to use
reviews.comment: Have to use a map instead of a list- photos are impossible to view.  ios app is much better-disappointed by this.
reviews.author: Seb Woodward

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Why go and ruin a perfectly good app. Rightmove is far superior.
reviews.author: Jim cottom

reviews.title: Fine, but....
reviews.comment: Its fine but just uses zoopla. What is the point.
reviews.author: Gareth Baird

reviews.title: Appalling
reviews.comment: I preferred the previous findaproperty app, before Zoopla ruined it. Fortunately Rightmove\'s app is still good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Very dull witted app finds few properties only plus keeps resetting options
reviews.author: Kusum Gajjar

reviews.title: I\'ve used better
reviews.comment: The application will only allow you to look at one location and doesn\'t allow you to filter the range. Whilst Im looking at a small area it sometimes pops up with everything in the county when imnalreasy half way though the list i wanted to look at! All in all fairly useless app.
reviews.author: Lucy Firth

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Properties I found had been rented months previous!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Latest zoopla update is a great example of how to make a decent app into a dysfuntional one...uninstalled...why can\'t they atleast open rightmove app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest update
reviews.comment: Latest update makes it so useless, so difficult to navigate, shame before it was really good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ken
reviews.comment: Rubbish
reviews.author: Kehinde Aina

reviews.title: Update??
reviews.comment: Since the update this is rubbish do not change things if its not broken
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really slow and buggy
reviews.comment: Uninstalled
reviews.author: Paul Hutchinson

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Is basically a copy of the mobile website. Works well enough, but could have much better functionality if made into a fully fledged app. Zoopla is better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: App is ok. Good list of properties. I\'ve not updated to latest version as I don\'t see why It needs to control camera?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying problems
reviews.comment: Viewing a property, hit back to return to list, puts you back at the top. One word - annoying! Also, I\'m a first time buyer and therefore at the lower end of the market. There\'s no clear way to exclude park homes. Please add this feature!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited
reviews.comment: App is very useful but has many limitations. Definitely needs better integration with location-based services and ability to search by number of bathrooms and by floor area. Wish there was a feature to mark properties as \'not interested\' so they don\'t show up in the search results. Critical decision criteria often missing from listings, e.g. service charge & leasehold details.
reviews.author: A Google User
